bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame, seatstay & chainstay, removable Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, E2 fully integrated tapered head tube, BB95 bottom bracket, Flow Mold carbon swing link, internal cable routing, Stealth shock routing, MicroTruss, 100mm travel

components.description: Bontrager Race X Lite Tubeless Ready Disc, 15mm front hub, 142x12 rear hub
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 5mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Avid XX World Cup hydraulic disc
Trek shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
